meanings.definition: The red lights at the rear of a vehicle that light up when the brakes are applied.
meanings.sent1: The taillights glowed brightly when the car stopped.
meanings.sent2: Drivers should always check their taillights before starting the car.
meanings.sent3: The taillights seemed to wink playfully at the following cars.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter lit up the room like taillights in the dark.
meanings.sent5: The taillights shone like beacons in the night, guiding the way.
meanings.sent6: At night, the taillights are essential for safe driving.
meanings.sent7: The taillights of the truck were visible from far away.
meanings.sent8: I always feel reassured when I see bright taillights ahead of me.
meanings.sent9: The taillights of the car ahead flickered in the rain.
meanings.sent10: The taillights of the bus were like two glowing eyes in the dark.
